tool_description: Calculates the angular separation between two celestial bodies and determines if they form any major or minor astrological aspects.

planet1_longitude.description: First planet's ecliptic longitude in degrees (0-360)

planet2_longitude.description: Second planet's ecliptic longitude in degrees (0-360)

error_messages: Invalid longitude values: Both longitudes must be between 0 and 360 degrees
Invalid orb tolerance: Must be between 0.5 and 10 degrees
Calculation error: Unable to compute angular separation
usage: Provide ecliptic longitudes for two planets and optionally set orb tolerance. Returns angular separation and whether it forms a recognized aspect.

shortest_arc.description: Shortest arc between planets in degrees

is_separating.description: Whether the aspect is separating (true) or applying (false)
